StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalIncludeDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more directories to add to the include path; use semi-colon delimited list if more than one. (-I[path])

StringListProperty.Name: ForcedIncludeFiles
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more forced include files. (-include [path])

StringProperty.Name: EntryPoint
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the function name to use for the entry point. The default is 'main'. (-entry [function])

EnumProperty.Name: Profile
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the profile to use for the shader. (-profile [profile])

EnumValue.Name: sce_vs_es_on_chip_orbis
EnumValue.DisplayName: Vertex as Export Shader on Chip

StringListProperty.Name: PreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more preprocessor defines; use semi-colon delimited list if more than one. (-D[name[=value]])

BoolProperty.Name: WarningsAsErrors
BoolProperty.Description: Enables the compiler to treat warnings as errors. (-Werror)

BoolProperty.Name: WarnPerformance
BoolProperty.Description: Enables warnings about potential performance hazards. (-Wperf)

EnumProperty.Name: Language
EnumProperty.Description: Selects the language to use for warning and error messages. (-lang jp)

BoolProperty.Name: MultiProcessorCompilation
BoolProperty.Description: Enables multiple source files to be compiled in parallel limited by the value specified in "Max Compilations".

IntProperty.Name: ProcessorNumber
IntProperty.Description: Specifies the maximum number of concurrent compiles to use for this project. If no value is given, the global VC++ setting for "Maximum concurrent C++ compilations" is used.

BoolProperty.Name: Distributable
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies if distributed compilation is allowed during a distributed build. Source files will always be compiled locally if disallowed.

BoolProperty.Name: FastMath
BoolProperty.Description: Enable algebraic transforms (e.g. Use 'a * 2' in place of 'a + a'). (-fastmath, -nofastmath)

EnumProperty.Name: HwTarget
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the hardware target for the compiler to generate for. (-target [type])

EnumProperty.Name: PsslLanguageStd
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the language standard to use for PSSL source. (-pssl1, -pssl2)

StringProperty.Name: OutputFileName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a name to override the default output file name. (-o [file])

EnumProperty.Name: SdbCache
EnumProperty.Description: Output an SDB (Shader Debug) cache file with or without AST info for shader association. (-cache, -cache-ast)

StringProperty.Name: SdbCacheDir
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a path to the directory to write any SDB cache file to. (-cachedir [path])

StringProperty.Name: AdditionalOptions
StringProperty.Description: Specify additional compiler command line options not provided by the other properties. The options format must be valid.

BoolProperty.Name: Embed
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies that the shader binary should be automatically embedded into the project's output.

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateHeader
BoolProperty.Description: Use the bin2h tool to generate a C Header File from the shader binary created by compilation.

StringProperty.Name: HeaderFileName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the name for the generated header file.

StringProperty.Name: Bin2HOptions
StringProperty.Description: Specify additional command line options to be passed to the bin2h tool when generating the header file.
